favourite.article: Lord, You are so near, be everything to us!
Amen. Lord I love You. There's no one like You. Lord You are my everything. Cause us to love You more everyday, and every hour. Hallelujah!
O Lord Jesus! I love You!
This song reminds me of the young people's conferences.... Lord I love You!
Oh Lord Jesus! Yes, Lord. Help me to love You more today than I did yesterday. :)
